survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with AI-powered customer support systems, focusing on effectiveness, ease of use, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer support systems?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for simplicity and clarity.

script.question_text: How frequently do you interact with AI-powered customer support systems?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered customer support features have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered customer support features have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the responsiveness of AI-powered customer support?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better granularity in responses.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the responsiveness of AI-powered customer support?

questions.question_text: What is the primary reason you use AI-powered customer support?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an open-text follow-up if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: What is the primary reason you use AI-powered customer support?

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have faced when using AI-powered customer support.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you have faced when using AI-powered customer support.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend AI-powered customer support to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard NPS-like scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend AI-powered customer support to others?

questions.question_text: Which industries do you think would benefit most from AI-powered customer support? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an open-text follow-up if 'Other' is selected.

script.question_text: Which industries do you think would benefit most from AI-powered customer support? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in AI-powered customer support systems?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather innovative ideas.

script.question_text: What additional features would you like to see in AI-powered customer support systems?

questions.question_text: Do you prefer AI-powered customer support over human customer support?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge preference trends.

script.question_text: Do you prefer AI-powered customer support over human customer support?
